obfuscation: ﻿ `` The new order of things proposed '' : Vision and Reality in Robert Owen 's New Lanark and New Harmony .
original: ﻿ "The new order of things proposed": Vision and Reality in Robert Owen's New Lanark and New Harmony.

obfuscation: The Welsh manufacturer Robert Owen made respective community experiments in the early 19th century .
original: The Welsh manufacturer Robert Owen made several community experiments in the early 19th century.

obfuscation: Two of them were the experiments in New Lanark , Scotland , and New Harmony , Indiana , in the U.S. New Lanark was Owen 's first social experiment where he made a village with a cotton mill into a model community .
original:
Two of them were the experiments in New Lanark, Scotland, and New Harmony, Indiana, in the U.S. 
New Lanark was Owen's first social experiment where he made a village with a cotton mill into a model community.

obfuscation: New Harmony was a later attempt of Owen to make a self-contained community .
original: New Harmony was a later attempt of Owen to create a self-contained community.

obfuscation: In this essay I will present significant aspects of these two experiments in order to compare them .
original: In this essay I will present important aspects of these two experiments in order to compare them.

obfuscation: In the early 1800 's the Welshman Robert Owen , who was a partner in a Manchester firm , became a manager of the New Lanark mill in Lanarkshire in Scotland .
original: In the early 1800's the Welshman Robert Owen, who was a partner in a Manchester firm, became a manager of the New Lanark mill in Lanarkshire in Scotland.

obfuscation: Owen was confronted with bad living conditions as well as bad working conditions in the factory .
original: Owen was confronted with bad living conditions as well as bad working conditions in the factory.

obfuscation: Child labour was very common , theft was extensive , the workers had poor housing circumstances in squalid surroundings and there was no education for children .
original: Child labour was very common, theft was extensive, the workers had poor housing conditions in squalid surroundings and there was no education for children.

obfuscation: Owen immediately turned the fiddling village with the cotton mill as a nucleus into a `` welfare program '' .
original: Owen immediately turned the little village with the cotton mill as a nucleus into a "welfare program".

obfuscation: Owen improved many conditions such as the workers ' food , clothes , houses and the cleanliness in the factory .
original: Owen improved many conditions such as the workers' food, clothes, houses and the cleanliness in the factory.

obfuscation: He prevented drunkenness by starting to sell alcohol under strict control .
original: He prevented drunkenness by starting to sell alcohol under strict control.

obfuscation: Best known is that he started an education for children .
original: Best known is that he started an education for children.

obfuscation: Owen agreed that all these improvements in New Lanark would promote the productivity of the cotton mill and therefore the improvements fostered efficiency at the same time as they composed a type of social reform .
original: Owen agreed that all these improvements in New Lanark would promote the productivity of the cotton mill and thus the improvements fostered efficiency at the same time as they composed a type of social reform.

obfuscation: Naturally the improvements of the community fee-tailed expenses but Owen maintained that this would make the mill more profitable .
original: Naturally the improvements of the community entailed expenses but Owen maintained that this would make the mill more profitable.

obfuscation: Owen 's chief philosophy was that man 's character is formed in early childhood , not by himself , but for him , and only by the environment .
original: Owen's main philosophy was that man's character is formed in early childhood, not by himself, but for him, and only by the environment.

obfuscation: To create a good character man should be placed under good influences in the early days .
original: To create a good character man should be placed under good influences in the early years.

obfuscation: Owen further believed that company had a responsibility to offer good living conditions and education for the people .
original: Owen further believed that society had a responsibility to offer good living conditions and education for the people.

obfuscation: By improving many bad conditions in New Lanark he offered the workers a good life .
original: By improving many bad conditions in New Lanark he offered the workers a better life.

obfuscation: Owen agreed that he had changed the character of the New Lanark inhabitants by his alterations .
original: Owen agreed that he had changed the character of the New Lanark inhabitants by his alterations.

obfuscation: The fact is that Owen did n't intend to change the New Lanark mill 's basic character but he wanted to create new , good conditions in the mill .
original: The fact is that Owen didn't intend to change the New Lanark mill's basic character but he wanted to create new, better conditions in the mill.

obfuscation: The children who were brought up in New Lanark were generally healthy and respected .
original: The children who were brought up in New Lanark were generally healthy and respected.

obfuscation: The mill in New Lanark was very productive and became a success and a model community .
original: The mill in New Lanark was very productive and became a success and a model community.

obfuscation: New Lanark was consequently a mill that Owen turned into a community , which is in contrast to one of his belated social experiments , New Harmony , which was rather a planned Utopia to which Owen gathered a number of people in order to put his theories , both social and economic , into practice .
original: New Lanark was consequently a mill that Owen turned into a community, which is in contrast to one of his later social experiments, New Harmony, which was rather a planned Utopia to which Owen gathered a number of people in order to put his theories, both social and economic, into practice.

obfuscation: In this project Owen adopted a new economic plan that he emphasised , where the size of the community was important from the point of view of production .
original: In this project Owen followed a new economic plan that he emphasised, where the size of the community was important from the point of view of production.

obfuscation: In 1825 Owen bought a great piece of land in Indiana which he renamed New Harmony .
original: In 1825 Owen bought a great piece of land in Indiana which he renamed New Harmony.

obfuscation: His plan was to make a self-contained community , intending that the people would be self-supporting , producing their own products together with other co-operative villages .
original: His plan was to create a self-contained community, intending that the people would be self-supporting, producing their own products together with other co-operative villages.

obfuscation: Owen thought that there was a special number of people ( about 1200 persons ) who could live in the community in order to keep it self-contained .
original: Owen believed that there was a special number of people (about 1200 persons) who could live in the community in order to keep it self-contained.

obfuscation: Many activities in the community , such as eating and cooking , would be collective .
original: Many activities in the community, such as eating and cooking, would be collective.

obfuscation: Before the start Owen invited `` the industrious and well disposed of all nations '' to come to this community and be inhabitants .
original: Before the start Owen invited "the industrious and well disposed of all nations" to come to this community and be inhabitants.

obfuscation: Many of those who came did n't turn away to be as willing to learn as the New Lanark inhabitants .
original: Many of those who came didn't turn out to be as willing to learn as the New Lanark inhabitants.

obfuscation: The community soon ran into difficulties since people were at odds about the form of government and the function of religion .
original: The community soon ran into difficulties since people were at odds about the form of government and the role of religion.

obfuscation: New Harmony was consequently a failure and did n't concluding long .
original: New Harmony was consequently a failure and didn't last long.

obfuscation: Owen withdrew from the project in 1828 .
original: Owen withdrew from the project in 1828.

obfuscation: New Harmony was therefore intended to be a model community which could live on its own and offer work to unemployed and people without housing .
original: New Harmony was thus intended to be a model community which could live on its own and offer work to unemployed and people without housing.

obfuscation: In this subject Owen turned to more general problems of society .
original: In this case Owen turned to more general problems of society.

obfuscation: An aspect of this was to cure pauperism and unemployment .
original: An aspect of this was to cure pauperism and unemployment.

obfuscation: This was in comparison to New Lanark where more specific problems were in focus , such as improving factory conditions .
original: This was in comparison to New Lanark where more specific problems were in focus, such as improving factory conditions.

obfuscation: However , both of the experiments were plans for social reorganisation , the by and by one being based on a self-supporting community .
original: However, both of the experiments were plans for social reorganisation, the later one being based on a self-supporting community.

obfuscation: The social aspect was also apparent since Owen 's experiments were focused on the lower classes of society .
original: The social aspect was also apparent since Owen's experiments were focused on the lower classes of society.

obfuscation: In his later experiment he wanted to decrease the widespread unemployment by putting up small communities ; in New Lanark he improved the conditions for a number of lower-class people .
original: In his later experiment he wanted to decrease the widespread unemployment by setting up small communities; in New Lanark he improved the conditions for a number of lower-class people.

obfuscation: Even if it was obvious that Owen was concerned with the economic aspects of his communities he constantly had in mind that man should have good living conditions .
original: Even if it was obvious that Owen was concerned with the economic aspects of his communities he always had in mind that man should have good living conditions.

obfuscation: He believed that company had the responsibility to offer these conditions to the people .
original: He believed that society had the responsibility to offer these conditions to the people.

obfuscation: Since the factory is the dominant part in man 's life it must be as full as possible so he can live in it , Owen maintained .
original: Since the factory is the dominant part in man's life it must be as good as possible so he can live in it, Owen maintained.

obfuscation: However , his purpose of his experiments were upon the community and not on the individual .
original: However, his purpose of his experiments was upon the community and not on the individual.

obfuscation: Owen 's chief philosophy , that man is formed by the environment and that he should be placed under a good influence , was something that he based all his work on .
original: Owen's main philosophy, that man is formed by the environment and that he should be placed under a good influence, was something that he based all his work on.

obfuscation: This was also something that Owen indeed tried to carry into effect by his social experiments .
original: This was also something that Owen indeed tried to carry into effect by his social experiments.

obfuscation: Happiness was a keyword for Owen 's work : `` The object of all human exertions is to be felicitous .
original: Happiness was a keyword for Owen's work: "The object of all human exertions is to be happy.

obfuscation: Happiness can not be attained , enjoyed and secured , unless all men possess health , actual knowledge and wealth . ''
original: Happiness cannot be attained, enjoyed and secured, unless all men possess health, real knowledge and wealth."

obfuscation: 1 Owen experiments had a pragmatic means of working .
original: 1 Owen experiments had a pragmatic way of working.

obfuscation: He tried to form guidelines or propose reforms that would make a new social environment for lower class people .
original: He tried to form guidelines or propose reforms that would create a new social environment for lower class people.

obfuscation: The fact is that his first attempt was a success while New Harmony did n't work in practice .
original: The fact is that his first attempt was a success while New Harmony didn't work in practice.

obfuscation: 1 Letter from Robert Owen to London Newspapers , August 7 , 1817
original: 1 Letter from Robert Owen to London Newspapers, August 7, 1817
